name: Wibble at the End of the Universe
name_original: Wibble at the End of the Universe
description:
It's Wibble at the End of the Universe!
You are tasked by Garglok the Intergalactic Warlord to activate the Prime Destroyer and Begin the Universe anew by destroying it
Will Wibble follow his master, or will he defy him by destroying the button, and face his wrath in the lair

Wibble is a game I made for a game jam a few months back. I followed a platforming tutorial by griffpatch and added my own twists here and there. I am extremely happy with how I utilized the tileset when making my background

You can check out the game here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/652139133/

This game makes use of the Industrial Tileset by 0x72
https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
Please check out their work!

Music: Context Sensitive - Fever, Danger
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/
Horus Heresy Legions Menu Theme
Life's Incredible Again - Michael Giacchino

I do not own any of the music in this game, and I insist that no one places a donation on this game in particular, because I do not want to make money off the hard work of others.
